name: Lost Somewhere
description:
You start with seeing (almost) nothing. You need to dive down to find the iconic characters that are lost somewhere, but where?

How to play: Move camera with WASD and zoom in/out by SPACE.

Goal: Find all of 4 iconic characters and photograph them to complete the game.

We have developed this small hidden object game within ~48 by eating lots of munchies and slacking most of the time. Hope you enjoy it as much as we did while creating it!

Game Design & Development: Burak Kurkcu / Twitter
Art: Elif Tavkul / Behance / Instagram

Developed for Ludum Dare 45 in 48 hours as jam entry.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/lost-somewhere
